MemoryInfobox.description: 'Forts have always been vital for Peloponnesian War|controlling territory and ensuring peace. They're also a great place for storing treasure and valuables.'

General_Description: '''Fortress Fallout''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra was charged to [[raid]] numerous [[fort]]s throughout [[Greece]].
Section_Outcome: After infiltrating many forts all around Greece to burn supplies, loot riches, and kill the garrisons' ''[[Strategos|strategoi]]'', Kassandra returned to the contact in [[Kirrha]], [[Phokis]], to receive a reward.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] ''
